result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Dennis L. Maurer
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220   (Effective: 04-21-2022)
Prior: 6329 Fetzer Rd, Manitowoc, WI 54220
Re:  Swatting-false reporting of an emergency, on 04-02-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of fail to comply with officer take into custody, swatting, and battery or threat to law enforcement.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 04-25-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $2,500.00 cash bond with the conditions that defendant must maintain absolute sobriety.   Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the custody of the Sheriff. 
Minutes.
